issue.title: Revert "Contain the use of reflection in amazon-lambda"
issue.body:
This reverts commit https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/commit/56470f288782a1f2647cef45f808c7691f03579a  (https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/48425).

Fixes https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/49413

The optimization is causing functional issues.
It might be possible to improve it but for now let's be safe and fix it in the next micro.

I added a test in a separate commit.

/cc @zakkak FYI.

body:
Thanks for the reproducer and the pointer.

You were indeed spot on. See https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/49416 .
Thank you very much for the quick fix/revert and the appreciation for my research. ðŸ™‚
Let's discuss this when @zakkak is back from PTO.

issue.title: Fix Amazon Lambda handler discovery fallback
issue.body:
- Reverts https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/49416
- Adds fallback to use root implementer when no matching `handleRequest` method is found in the class hierarchy.

Fixes #49413

cc @gsmet
